channel.title: Client button option

item.title: Client button option
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

[s]Ok, on my client i made it so when you click file, options appear.

I have world 1 and world 2.

I wanna make it so when you click them, they switch ips.

Now, i somewhat have this.

Except when you click, lets say, world 1, a menu pops up, and you have to type in the ip.

I wanna make it so when you click world 1, it switches it automatically, without having to type it in.

Hereâ€™s my code for the command.

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("World 1")) { try { String sServer = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(this, "Please type: MYSERVERIP"); Serverip = sServer; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(sServer)); } catch(Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }[/s]

fixed - lock please

Read full topic
